channel.title: Software Engineering on Awe-AI
channel.description: Recent content in Software Engineering on Awe-AI

item.title: SWALM Agent: Intelligent Software Engineering Agent
item.description: SWALM Agent is our flagship project — an intelligent agent framework designed to autonomously solve complex software engineering tasks. It integrates multiple agent architectures (CodeAct, SWE-Agent, Cline) with a rich set of tools for code editing, shell execution, and web browsing.
